translations: 带来（成本、花费等）；招致，遭受

sentences.sentence: Any expenses you may incur will be chargeable to the company.
sentences.translation: 你的所有开销均由本公司支付。

sentences.sentence: Contractors who fall behind schedule incur heavy financial penalties.
sentences.translation: 承包商如延误工期将被处以巨额罚款。

sentences.sentence: The strategic regulation of evening body reserves is also likely to incur additional costs, as nightingales must spend more time foraging in order to build up larger body reserves.
sentences.translation: 晚间的身体储能的策略管理机制，也会产生额外的能量支出，这样夜莺就必须花更多时间找食物，来增加储能。
